title: Provides that an inmate of a correctional facility shall be guilty of a felony for harassing a correctional facility employee by fraudulent use of his or her name
summary: Provides that an inmate of a correctional facility shall be guilty of a felony for harassing a correctional facility employee by fraudulent use of his or her name in publishing the name or ordering products under the employee's name.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to penalizing an inmate in a correctional facility for harassing certain employees by fraudulently using the name of any such employee
